mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Richmond, Nathaniel P. to Anisansel, Henry
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Richmond, Nathaniel P.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Col H Anisansel Wheeling Oct 19 1861. By Telegraph from Parkersburg 19 1861. We leave at ten 10 oclock today for Wirt CH Capt Hill is surrounded but not cut up as reported. N.P. Richmond Lieut Col Comdg Detachment 20W70col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Richmond, Nathaniel P.
Parkersburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Anisansel, Henry
